About me

Professional Career

I started as an IT contractor picking up odd jobs on Craigslist while attending University. I worked for Geek Squad as a seasonal Field Service Implementation Engineer helping other technicians perform on-site Wi-Fi troubleshooting, performing cable runs, and TV installations.

As my contract with Geek Squad was winding down, I found a great position with Whitaker Parking Systems. During my tenure there, I worked heavily on RFID(HID) and remote computerized access control systems, ensuring PCI-DSS compliance of POS/POF devices, electro-mechanical Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) troubleshooting, and legacy RS232 serial-to-ethernet low-voltage communications integration for VOIP(Commend) devices. While I was an Amano-McGann Parking Systems Technician I had an opportunity to take a contract position with Amazon Web Services.

I excelled in my new Data Center Operations role and was brought on full-time. After demonstrating my ability to quickly resolve complicated hardware tickets, Linux OS/firmware issues, document my resolutions and disseminate them via the online repo I was promoted to DCO Lead Technician/Support Engineer. This role required a variety of skills from technical escalation point for 20 junior DCO technicians across 3 Data Centers, liaising with external vendors deploying new infrastructure, remediation of enterprise level networking equipment, becoming the USA-East training curriculum designer for Data Center Operations in Dulles, VA., and SOP/MOP creation to limit blast radius for external Fortune 500 clients operating on cloud infrastructure.

Hobbies

I have a variety of hobbies including forcing Windows to run Linux, programming, scripting, DevOps, Dockerizing host migrations, Cisco networking, and all things Linux(but preferably RHEL/CentOS). Lately I've been trying to automate any task I can find. I also golf when I can pull my self out of the shell.

Education and Certifications

I attended Temple University for Computer Science and I'm an AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
